## MarketplaceAuction.getListing() method

Get an Auction listing by id

**Signature:**

```typescript

```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type         | Description    |
| --------- | ------------ | -------------- |
| listingId | BigNumberish | the listing Id |

**Returns:**
